title: 13-month-old baby fatally shot
content:
DAYTON, Ohio (WKRC) - A 13-month-old boy was fatally shot in Dayton, Ohio.
The Montgomery County Coroner's office said Elijah Johnson died just before midnight Thursday, January 14. Dayton police said the boy, his grandmother and a man were hit by shots from a passing car as they stood outside a house Thursday afternoon. Officers told Local 12's sister station, WKEF, the grandmother drove the child and the man to the hospital but she did not stay there, even though she'd been shot in the shoulder.
The child later died.
Police are trying to find out if the gunman specifically targeted the victims. Officials haven't identified any suspects.
